elements.name: Test the website language and currency change

steps.name: I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I click flag button on topbar
I should be presented with 'Deutsch (Switzerland)' flag on topbar
Default 'Warschau' should be translated to selected language

elements.name: Test the website language and currency change

steps.name: I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I click flag button on topbar
I should be presented with 'Fran√ßais' flag on topbar
Default 'Varsovie' should be translated to selected language

elements.name: Test the website language and currency change

steps.name: I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I click flag button on topbar
I should be presented with 'Dansk' flag on topbar
Default 'Warszawa' should be translated to selected language

elements.name: Test the website language and currency change

steps.name: I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I click flag button on topbar
I select currency 'United States dollar - USD'
I should be presented with 'English (United States)' flag on topbar
Default 'Warsaw' should be translated to selected language

I should be presented with 'Magyar' flag on topbar
Default 'Vars√≥' should be translated to selected language

name: Change Language and Currency on kiwi.com

steps.name: I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I should be presented with selected trip type 'Nomad'
I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I should be presented with selected trip type 'Multi-city'
I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I should be presented with selected trip type 'One-way'
I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I should be presented with selected trip type 'Return'
I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I should be presented with selected cabin class 'Economy'
I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I should be presented with selected cabin class 'Premium Economy'
I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I should be presented with selected cabin class 'Business'
I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I should be presented with selected cabin class 'First Class'

elements.name: Test default passengers and bags number

steps.name: I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I should be presented with the number of '4' 'passengers'
I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I should be presented with the number of '2' 'bags'
I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I click Create an account link
I type an 'random' email and 'random' password
I click on the Create an account button
I should be presented with Verify your email message

elements.name: Check the possibility of registering an existing email address

steps.name: I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I click Create an account link
I type an 'test.cypress@wp.pl' email and 'Test.Cypress@@' password
I click on the Create an account button
I should be presented with warning message
I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I should be presented with message We sent a code to email
I navigate to the kiwi.com homepage
I click Sign in button in confirmation pop-up
I should see the name of the logged in user 'test.cypress'
